content: Is there any official (federal) recommendation how to format a postal code string? I.e., with or without the space, etc.
Canada Post has this to say: https://www.canadapost.ca/tools/pg/manual/PGaddress-e.asp?ecid=murl10006450#1449294
Thank you. I've just found this one - https://www.canadapost.ca/tools/pg/manual/PGaddress-e.asp?ecid=murl10006450 - which explains the use of space in between.
